I co-founded Kore1 in 2005, with the intent to establish an exceptional brand within the staffing and recruiting industry. Kore1 has since grown into a nationwide provider of recruiting and staffing services for Technology, Digital & Creative, Engineering, Accounting & Finance, Marketing and sales.  Backed by our world class recruiting engine, we are focused on helping business executives create world-class organizations by enabling them to choose a single, highly competent recruiting partner that can provide thought leadership, best of breed solutions, and consistent delivery results. We are focused on delivering end-to-end talent solutions that help organizations achieve their key business objectives. Kore1 offers Staffing, Workforce Management, Software Development, Recruiting, Contract, Contract-to-Hire, Direct Hire, and Payroll Services to companies of all sizes. From the beginning, we were committed to initiating quality relationships with our candidates, while building a reputation for exceptional follow up and customer service. Today, Kore1 is ranked as one of the fastest growing companies in the US. Recent accomplishments include: •	Fastest Growing Private Companies in America (ranked #495) (Inc. 5000, 2016)•       Fastest Growing Private Companies in America (ranked #1156) (Inc. 5000, 2015)•       28th fastest growing company in Orange County (Orange County Business Journal, 2014)•       85th fastest growing company in the country for IT Services (Inc. Magazine, 2013)•       664th fastest growing company in the country (Inc. Magazine, 2013)•       27th fastest growing company in Orange County (Orange County Business Journal, 2012)•       21st fastest growing company in Orange County (Orange County Business Journal, 2013)My role at Kore1 has since progressed to Managing Partner. I am continuing to build quality relationships within a wide network of outstanding peers and leaders across a number of industries.

Oculu (www.oculu.com) is Innovate Media's online video delivery engine and is also a stand alone online video delivery and analytics platform serving videos for thousands of clients. Innovate Media (www.innovatemedia.com) is a turnkey online video production company operating since 2003 having produced videos for thousands of clients.  Both companies are growing conservatively.

Founded in 2008, Digital Media Partners is a digital media company, offering client services and turn-key partner solutions for the capturing and webcasting of rich multimedia communication including a broad range of live event and video hosting services.

X Drive was a little ahead of it's time.  It was attempting to crack into the F500 market and sell Internet based storage solutions but security and bandwidth weren't what they are today.  My team was responsible for prospecting, working with and closing deals with F500 organizations.
